name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: A lot of times, the problem is admittedly budget. It's hard to "dream big" when you have a pittance of funding and you have to recover election money / perform PR. They do what they can, corruption aside.    (Sad reality. It takes money to get elected - from a personal standpoint, the barangay official has to make this back, minimum, unless his job objective is to get into public service / office and lose money without currying favors from any rich benefactor.)
